Title: Amazing Tag Cloud Control
Description:
This is an ASP.NET control written in C# that generates a tag cloud.

The cloud is generated by setting a text property.

Additional properties control the clouds appearance and behaviour.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is an ASP.NET control written in C# that generates a tag cloud.

The cloud is generated by setting a text property.

Additional properties control the clouds appearance and behaviour.

Examples of its usage can be seen at http://cloudsearch.aeteam.co.uk

and http://cloudsearch.aeteam.co.uk/CloudControl.aspx
